subject: Music
title: A Tribe Called Quest and Jazz Rap
description: A quick, practical guide to A Tribe Called Quest and Jazz Rap.

hook.text: A Tribe Called Quest made hip-hop that was smart, smooth, and jazz-infused.

buildup.text: Q-Tip and Phife Dawg traded verses over mellow jazz samples and laid-back beats.

discovery.text: The Low End Theory blended jazz bass lines with hip-hop in a way nobody had tried before.

twist.text: They proved you didn't need aggression to be respected â€” intelligence was its own power.

climax.text: They opened the door for conscious hip-hop â€” artists like Mos Def and Common followed.

punchline.text: They whispered in a genre that shouted. Everyone leaned in to listen.

quiz.question: What made A Tribe Called Quest's sound distinctive?
options: Jazz samples blended with laid-back hip-hop beats
